channel.title: Basic html vote layout
channel.description:
Hi Guys im just releasing a basic HTML vote Layout,I do not provide the systems to vote,This is just a layout Do not try and take my credits,The credits are %100 to me.Yes im giving the permission for you to use this as your vote layout. Here it is guys [code]

Vote Now!

Our generator will be able to identify you if you havent voted& it will not be processed for a claim/reward.So dont try it!
Vote at the following links below
Voting keeps the server online&More players join

Insert Link Here Insert Link Here Insert Link Here Insert Link Here

[code] [/code]

item.title: Basic html vote layout
item.dc:creator: @xen0n xen0n
item.description:
@xen0n wrote:

I know you’re just learning HTML but this is bad, very bad.

You could have added some inline CSS or something to make it look generally appealing. It’s just some headers and a few links.

A monkey could make this.

Read full topic

item.title: Basic html vote layout
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Works for me (not gonna use). I don’t know anything about html age, but it might just be because your computer is new, mine is from 2002.

Read full topic

item.title: Basic html vote layout
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:4, topic:452184”][quote author=Ollie123 link=topic=555067.msg4064544#msg4064544 date=1343750297]
Sorry, but this is just godawful. It isn’t even valid HTML.
[/quote]

It is html… but this is wrong (below)

[code=html]

[code] [/code]

You have to have of of your html code inside of this [/quote]

It is HTML, just not VALID HTML.

8ad9d57a12aa6e094f5f3bc47072a4d4.png?13437813831350×637

Read full topic
